shortBio.shortBio:
Currently working on UI and resume templates at [Resume.io](https://resume.io "Link to Resume.io website")

Prior to joining resume.io, was working as a front-end engineer at [Pure.sex](https://pure.sex "Link to Pure.sex app"), a dating service app.

Worked on [Tinkoff Journal](https://journal.tinkoff.ru/ "Link to Tinkoff journal website"), [New ethics](https://etika.nplus1.ru/ "Link to new ethic site") and a lot of different e-commerce sites and online magazines with guys from [CodeCode](https://codecode.ru/ "Link to codecode company website")

Developed a lot of UI libraries at [Great Simple Studio](https://greatsimple.io/ "Link to greatsimple studio website"). Made HTML email templates kit integrated with Mailchimp and Shopify customization tools

Have launched a webdev community [Dev Seagulls](https://www.instagram.com/dev_seagulls/ "Link to dev seagulls community instagram page") in my hometown Makhachkala. During my role as an community leader, Iâ€™ve organized several meetups, hackathons and offline classes, which helped me
to practice my public speaking and teaching skills.

Inspired by generative arts and animations, I invest my free time into making tiny web-experiments.
